info.name: Galaxy Online 2 - game page cleanup
info.description: a quick style to remove un-needed parts of the game page
info.additionalInfo:
v1) Created for galaxy.igg.com - the IGG only copy of the game 
v2) added go2.igg.com - this is the facebook version of the site
v3) added go2.browsergame.com - This is used for the events for Go2
